title: Pedagogical Preparation for Teaching Languages
banerDescription: Gain pedagogical qualifications and prepare for a career as a foreign language teacher.
description:
• Individuals who want to obtain pedagogical qualifications
  • Professionals aiming to work as language teachers
  • People interested in gaining knowledge in pedagogy, psychology, and didactics
description2: The aim of postgraduate studies is to provide preparation in psychology, pedagogy, and detailed didactics, ensuring the acquisition of knowledge and practical skills necessary for the teaching profession in accordance with the Act of July 20, 2018, Law on Higher Education and Science (Journal of Laws 2018 item 1668 as amended).
description3: The studies prepare individuals to work as foreign language teachers, trainers, lecturers, tutors, pedagogues, school psychologists, after-school care educators, dormitory supervisors, instructors, and librarians.

topics.title: Legal and Organizational Foundations of School Functioning
Core Curriculum for Preschool and General Education
Diagnosis, Monitoring, and Assessment of Educational Outcomes
Personal and Professional Development of a Teacher
Workplace Safety and Hygiene in Educational Institutions
Teaching Foreign Languages in Primary Schools
Teaching Foreign Languages in Secondary Schools
Information Technology and Media in Teaching

faculty: Classes are conducted by experienced practitioners in pedagogy, psychology, and didactics, with many years of experience in educational work.
practices:
• The professional internship includes 150 hours and provides hands-on teaching experience in foreign language education.
  • Internships can be completed at educational institutions at various levels.
evaluation: Assessment of learning outcomes is based on class participation, completion of module tasks, internships, and the preparation of a final project.
jobOpportunities:
Graduates of the program will be prepared to work as:

  • Foreign language teachers in schools and educational institutions
  • Language tutors
  • Pedagogues, school psychologists
  • Language instructors, librarians
invite: Gain pedagogical preparation and start your career in foreign language education.
